Package com.jackmeng.halcyoninae.cosmos.components.bottompane.filelist

Interface TabTree

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileList, LikeList
public interface TabTree
Represents a standard tree in the bottom pane viewport.
Since:
3.1
Author:
Jack Meng
